headline: BTIG Upgrades Palo Alto Networks (PANW) to Buy After Strong Channel Checks
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the AI Stocks in Focus on Wall Street. On October 13, BTIG upgraded the stock to “Buy” from Neutral with a $248 price target. The rating upgrade follows a series of channel checks. The firm engaged in discussions with seven contacts, which were “surprisingly positive.” Based on checks, […]
